terms.tosIntro: Welcome to DD – an app that provides daily content ("daily cards") for personal improvement, inspiration, and spiritual and emotional growth. Using the app constitutes agreement to the terms detailed below.
terms.s1Body: The app is intended for personal use only and allows users to receive daily content, follow creators, and view unique cards. The service is provided "as is" (AS IS), with no liability for content, availability, or results of use.
terms.s2Body: An account must be created using email or other sign-in methods. The user agrees to provide accurate, complete, and up-to-date information. DD management reserves the right to suspend or delete a user account at any time if used in violation of these terms.
terms.s3Body: The service is intended for users aged 13 and above. If the user is under 13, parental or guardian consent is required to use the app.
terms.s4Body: All content in the app – including text, designs, images, videos, logo, and the DD brand name – is protected by copyright. No part of the app may be copied, distributed, reproduced, or used commercially without prior written approval from DD management.
terms.s5Body: Users may submit content such as cards or suggestions. By uploading content, the user confirms they are the legal owner of the material and grants DD a free license to use it for display or promotional purposes. DD may remove offensive, inappropriate, or copyright-infringing content.
terms.s6Body: The app may send daily notifications with new content or updates. Notifications can be disabled at any time through device settings.
terms.s7Body: The app is free to use. If paid content or services are added in the future, this will be clearly communicated before any charges.
terms.s8Body: Links to external websites may be displayed. DD is not responsible for the content, reliability, or privacy policies of these sites.
terms.s9Body: The service is provided "As-Is". DD is not liable for any direct or indirect damages resulting from use. The user agrees to indemnify DD for any damage or claim arising from use in violation of the terms.
terms.s10Body: DD reserves the right to modify, update, or discontinue the service at any time without prior notice. Changes to terms take effect upon publication in the app.
terms.s11Body: The governing law is the law of the State of Israel. Exclusive jurisdiction is held by the courts of Tel Aviv-Jaffa.
terms.privacyIntro: This policy explains how we collect, store, and use information from DD users.
p1Items: Usage data (cards viewed, preferences, usage times)
Device identifiers (Device ID, Expo Push Token)
System details (IP, device type, OS version)
p2Items: Sending notifications and daily content (with consent)
terms.p3Body: Data is stored on secure servers such as Render and MongoDB Atlas. DD does not sell personal information or transfer it to third parties unless required by law.
terms.p4Outro: Permissions can be revoked through device settings.
terms.p6Body: The app may contain links to other websites. DD is not responsible for their privacy policies or content.
terms.p7Body: DD may update from time to time. Significant changes will appear in the app or be sent by email. Last updated: October 16, 2025
